channel.title: Frag.Dev. in action
channel.description: The main component of this live set from the weekend is the Axoloti based "Fragmentation Device" which combines dual buffer looping with multi-effects mangling. Massive shout-out to SirSikSik whose Glitch and Factotum devices make a major contribution. https://secretkillerofnames.bandcamp.com/track/a-biscuit-tin-made-of-sound

item.title: Frag.Dev. in action
item.dc:creator: @Makrotulpa Lloyd W Barrett
item.description:
@Makrotulpa wrote:

The main component of this live set from the weekend is the Axoloti based "Fragmentation Device" which combines dual buffer looping with multi-effects mangling.
Massive shout-out to SirSikSik whose Glitch and Factotum devices make a major contribution.
